channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NM
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NM

item.title: Report X-2025040005
item.description:
Report X-2025040005

Identified by scraper @ 2025-04-20T00:57:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-29
  • City: ALBUQUERQUE
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ABF stated when forklift operator Dean Zurla loaded the freight he was backing out and the forks struck the drum and caused a small hole spilling roughly 2 liters to spill onto the trailer floor and dock. ABF stated they were able to flip the drum over to avoid a larger spill.
